content: मल्ल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मल्ल्-अच्] {@--1@} Strong, athletic, robust; <ls>Ki. 18. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Good; excellent. --ल्लः {@--1@} A strong man. {@--2@} An athlete, a boxer, wrestler; प्रभुर्मल्लो मल्लाय <ls>Mbh.</ls> {@--3@} A drinkingvessel, cup. {@--4@} The remnants of an oblation. {@--5@} The cheek and temple. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a mixed tribe (wrestlers) born of an outcast Kṣatriya by a Kṣatriya woman; <ls>Ms. 10. 22</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">12. 45.</ls> {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country. --ल्ला {@--1@} A woman. {@--2@} The Arabian jasmine. {@--3@} Ornamenting the person with cosmetics or coloured unguents.
